### Java Connector

A lightweight Java codebase that provides methods allowing users to directly call the API.

### SDKs for Each Language

- **Java**: [https://github.com/xt-com/xt4-java-demo](https://github.com/xt-com/xt4-java-demo)
- **Golang**: [https://github.com/xt-com/xt4-go-demo](https://github.com/xt-com/xt4-go-demo)
- **C#**: [https://github.com/xt-com/xt4-c--demo](https://github.com/xt-com/xt4-c--demo)
